section.name: Setting the browser type
section.p: Describes the settings related to the browser type. Search results are browser type can be added to the data, for each type of browser browsing search results out into.

subsection.name: How to set up
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click menu browser types.

subsection.name: Browser type
subsection.p: You can set the display name and value. It is used if you want more new terminals. You do not need special customizations are used only where necessary.
